mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, ARTICLE_ID, AMOUNT, TOTAL_PRICE, REUEST_DATE, BOOKING_STATE
mapper.select: SELECT `sp_booking`.id, `sys_customer`.name AS user_name, `sys_customer`.email AS user_email, `sys_customer`.tel AS user_phone, `sp_article`.name AS art_name, `sp_article`.comment AS art_desc, `sp_booking`.amount, `sp_booking`.request_date, `sp_booking`.total_price, `const_list`.const_name AS booking_state FROM `sp_booking` LEFT JOIN `sys_customer` ON `sp_booking`.user_id = `sys_customer`.id LEFT JOIN `sp_article` ON `sp_booking`.article_id = `sp_article`.id LEFT JOIN `const_list` ON `sp_booking`.booking_state = `const_list`.const_value WHERE 1 = 1 AND `sp_booking`.id = #{ID}
